meta.name: The Floor
meta.description: The Floor is a physical quiz show that sees 81 contestants face off in quiz duels on a giant LED floor divided into a 9×9 grid of squares, each representing its own field of knowledge.The first challenger, selected at random, must choose one of his or her neighboring opponents to go head-to-head in an epic quiz duel in the opponent's category. The winner takes over the loser's square, gaining valuable ground as they expand their territory, while the loser exits the game. The winner must then choose – do they continue on and attempt to secure another square? Or do they let The Floor choose a new challenger? The last contestant standing who gains full control over The Floor takes home a life-changing $250,000 cash prize.

videos.title: Fight to the Finish
videos.overview: With $250,000 on the line, the final 16 players must conquer the toughest, most intimidating categories yet to claim a life-changing victory.

videos.title: Let the Duel Begin
videos.overview: One player's mind freezes spectacularly against the clock.

videos.title: This is The Battle We've Been Waiting For
videos.overview: A new player emerges to dominate in a night of bands, toys and bugs.

videos.title: It's a Horror Show
videos.overview: Contestants' knowledge of musicals, horror movies and sports is tested.

videos.title: Don't Judge this Book by its Cover
videos.overview: Tensions rise as the remaining players try to keep hold of their turf; eight more players go home.

videos.title: I Did Not See That Coming
videos.overview: Fifty players remain, and two players are now tied for the most turf; eight players get sent home.

videos.title: You Can Run but You Can't Hide
videos.overview: The trivia battle turns up the heat as only 42 players remain.

videos.title: The BBQ Showdown
videos.overview: The remaining players are in for a shock when they find out the most players so far are going home.

videos.title: The Professor
videos.overview: The remaining 25 players try to hang onto their turf to be the last one standing.

videos.title: All Hail the King of the Floor
videos.overview: The 17 remaining contestants compete for the grand prize of $250,000.

videos.title: Tonight, I'm Going to Make History
videos.overview: The 17 remaining contestants compete for the grand prize of $250,000.

videos.title: Activate the Randomizer!
videos.overview: Contestants compete in a trivia battle on a massive game show floor for a whopping grand prize.

videos.title: They Rise & They Fall
videos.overview: Some major new players emerge.

videos.title: Bluff or Bust
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of disco, smoothies, cheese and superstars.

videos.title: The Triple Threat
videos.overview: Contestants face questions about vending machines, action movies, Gen Z and more.

videos.title: High Risk, High Reward?
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of constellations, baseball logos, carnival food and more.

videos.title: Halfway to $250k
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of blockbuster movies, pop stars, fitness and cooking.

videos.title: Who's Afraid of Virginia the Wolf?
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of flowers, state capitals, kid shows, gems and more.

videos.title: Go Big or Go Home
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of puppies, New York, world history and DIY.

videos.title: A Whale of a Time
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of Halloween movies, extreme sports, autumn and nursery rhymes.

videos.title: Heartbreak and Headaches
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of reality TV, girl groups, American history and hockey.

videos.title: Everyone Is a Target
videos.overview: The final 16 players enter the home stretch.

videos.title: Final Showdown
videos.overview: The final nine contestants test their knowledge of game show hosts, Shakespeare, sneakers and national parks; the winner is crowned.

videos.title: Season 3 Kicks Off
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of pets, gardening, ice cream flavors and ancient history.

videos.title: Star Power
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of sushi, SNL alumni, classic films and convenience store items.

videos.title: Fresh Faces, High Stakes
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of sandwich ingredients, rappers and sports.

videos.title: A Twist in the Game
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of sports films, college basketball, "Star Trek," and yoga.

videos.title: Strategic Showdown
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of TV moms, the Met Gala, fictional fathers and directors.

videos.title: Call My Bluff
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of natural history, "Real Housewives," space travel, TV chefs and more.

videos.title: A New Contender
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge on pasta, crayon colors, Tony Award winners, and hunting and camping.

videos.title: Let's Get Physical
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of competition shows, romantic comedies, physics, Beyonce songs and more.

videos.title: A Hot Streak
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of critters, billionaires, aviation, nerdy characters and more.

videos.title: Courage Under Fire
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of anatomy, baby products, songs, water brands and more.

videos.title: Bringing Down a Titan
videos.overview: Contestants test their knowledge of languages, eras, Marvel, classic cars and more.

videos.title: Conquer the Floor
videos.overview: The final nine compete and one takes home the $250,000 prize.

videos.title: The Battle of the States
videos.overview: With $40,000 at stake in the premiere episode, bluff and betrayal are already part of the game.

videos.title: Nowhere to Hide
videos.overview: A professional wrestler, a Brad Pitt doppelgänger and a Georgia Peach duel it out for territorial supremacy on The Floor.

videos.title: History is Made
videos.overview: A player loses their category without playing a duel.

videos.title: All is Fair in Love and Floor
videos.overview: Records are broken, as a new threat emerges and delivers a shocking blow that changes the face of the game.

videos.title: Karma
videos.overview: It is a cut-throat night, as promises are broken, alliances are betrayed and justice is delivered.

videos.title: Reign Under Fire
videos.overview: The reigning whale is challenged and eight incredible duels push ambitions, friendships and rivalries to the breaking point.

videos.title: Playing Offense
videos.overview: While the player with the most territory is confident with their defensive strategy, it is time for others to begin playing offense.

videos.title: Battle of the Besties
videos.overview: This season's most iconic duo goes head-to-head.

videos.title: The Knives Are Out
videos.overview: A mission to take a major player down.
